title: Replace existing ref guide references to zkcli with bin/solr zk options where possible
description:
I was looking through the CWiki for SOLR-9891 and noticed a fair number of references to zkcli. I'd like to replace as many of those as possible and use the bin/solr zk.... way of interacting with Zookeeper on the principle that fewer tools == less confusion.

Any help welcome!

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: I'm leaving the bits about ssl and all of security that aren't simply copying a file alone until the steps can be tested.
